description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget for the delivery history screen in a food delivery app. It includes a scaffold with an app bar and a list view containing header and placeholder rows for delivery history, earnings, and filter options.

classes.name: DeliveryHistoryScreen
classes.description: Stateless widget representing the delivery history screen, including app bar and list of placeholder items.

classes.name: _Header
classes.description: Private stateless widget displaying the header with gradient background, icon, and title.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: Private stateless widget representing each placeholder row in the list, with an icon and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for each of the classes, creating the UI components.
